EmailTemplate.subject: Data Centers Are Consuming More Than Ever Before. Help Plant Back.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, It’s no secret: data centers are consuming more energy than ever before.
In fact, they are the fastest-growing consumers of electricity in the United States.
The problem? Most data center servers are wildly underutilized. Even with virtualization, the majority of servers never come close to using their full capacity.
This is why utilizing your infrastructure as efficiently as possible is so important. In fact a recent NRDC study found that increasing server utilization could reduce data center electricity consumption by up to 40% - resulting in annual savings of $3.8 billion for US businesses and 39 Billion kilowatt hours of electricity. Enter VMTurbo Operations Manager VMTurbo helps you use existing hardware more efficiently – safely packing higher workload densities, reducing overhead and saving energy.
According to independent surveys, 80% of VMTurbo customers see an increase in utilization by 20% or more, while 37% see an increase of 40% or more. That’s real hard dollar savings for your business, and major savings for our environment. This year we are planting one back.
